input: Unlike most of the other U.S.-based asset managers we cover, we are projecting an improvement (albeit a slight one) in operating margins for BlackRock over the next five years, with the firm's margins expected to average around 41% on an adjusted basis (compared with 39% on average the past five calendar years).
